============
Introduction
============

This section introduces Tiny ML Tensorlab, Texas Instruments' comprehensive AI toolchain
for developing machine learning models on microcontrollers.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   what_is_tensorlab
   architecture
   terminology

Overview
--------

Tiny ML Tensorlab enables end-to-end machine learning workflows for embedded systems:

1. **Data Preparation** - Format and preprocess your datasets
2. **Model Training** - Train neural networks optimized for MCUs
3. **Model Optimization** - Quantize models for efficient deployment
4. **Compilation** - Generate device-ready code using TI's Neural Network Compiler
5. **Deployment** - Run inference on TI microcontrollers

Whether you're detecting electrical faults, classifying motor bearing conditions,
or building custom AI applications, Tiny ML Tensorlab provides the tools you need.
